title: Should You Take Crypto Payments as a Freelancer?

title: Google Takes Legal Action Against Scammers Peddling Malware-Laden ‘Bard’ AI Tool
description: In a watershed moment for the tech giant, Google has unleashed a multifaceted legal offensive against a nefarious group of alleged scammers peddling a malware-infested “generative AI” software, masquerading under the name Bard.
